description: The NAI AntiVirus alarm information.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrap NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAgent s EXAMPLE NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAgentVersion s EXAMPLE NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapSeverity i 1 NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapDescription s EXAMPLE NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAlarmSourceAddress s EXAMPLE NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAlarmSourceDNSName s EXAMPLE NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapGMTTime t 31536000 NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapLocalTime t 31536000 NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapURL s EXAMPLE NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapPseudoID i 9999 ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapAgentUser s EXAMPLE ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapInfectedFile s EXAMPLE ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapVirusName s EXAMPLE ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapTaskName s EXAMPLE ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapStatus i 9999 ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapOS s EXAMPLE ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapEngineVersion s EXAMPLE ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapDATVersion s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the agent that generated the trap.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAgent

description: The version of the agent that generated the trap.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAgentVersion

description: Additional information delivered with alarm messages and indicated the critical,
Major, Minor, Warning and informational. Advanced management applications can make
use of this information to better evaluate the severity of the situation. This
variable is only intended for use with traps; no meaning should be assumed by a
Manager to the value retrieved through a Get operation on this object.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapSeverity

description: The alarm description.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapDescription

description: This information identifies the piece of equipment which is casuing the alarm.
If the information is not available, then this field can be left blank.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAlarmSourceAddress

description: The fully qualified DNS name of the piece of equipment which is casuing the alarm.This can contain the name of the machine that sent the trap, if DNS name
is not available.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapAlarmSourceDNSName

description: The time that the condition or event occurred which caused
generation of this alarm. This value is given in seconds since
00:00:00 Greenwich mean time (GMT) January 1, 1970.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapGMTTime

description: The time that the condition or event occurred which caused
generation of this alarm. This value is given in seconds since
00:00:00 Local time January 1, 1970.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapLocalTime

description: A fully qualified URL link to an HTML page/FTP file for more information about the alarm.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapURL

description: This information identifies the pseudo-Id of the trap being sent.
If the information is not available, then this field can be left blank.
variables.name: NAI-V1-MIB::naiTrapPseudoID

description: This information identifies the user account which is causing the alarm.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapAgentUser

description: This information idenifies the infected file which is causing the alarm.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapInfectedFile

description: This information identifies the virus which is causing the alarm.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapVirusName

description: This information identifies the task which generated the alarm.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapTaskName

description: This information identifies the status of the file for which the trap is sent.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapStatus

description: This information identifies the platform of the machine from which the trap is sent.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapOS

description: This information identifies the version of the Scan engine on the machine for which the trap is sent.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapEngineVersion

description: This information identifies the the version of the DAT files on the machine for which the trap is sent.
variables.name: ANTIVIRUS-MIB::naiAntiVirusTrapDATVersion
